message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can seal the deal!
Not bad, but I think I can do better than that!
I'm not giving up that much, Bob. I'll make a new offer!
A more balanced offer this time. Let's meet in the middle!
Getting closer, but I still want a bit more!
Not quite there yet, Bob. I'll make another move!
Getting closer to the sweet spot. Your turn to decide!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about meeting me in the middle!
I'm not backing down, Bob. I'll make another offer!
Time's running out, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. But I'm not giving up yet!
You're not getting any younger either, Bob! I'll make another move!
Last chance, Bob. Take it or walk away!
You're pushing your luck, Alice. I'm not going to back down now!
You're not getting any more generous, Bob. I'll make another move!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
It's now or never, Alice. This is my final offer!
Fine, Bob. I'll take it. But I'm not happy about it!
